CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.description: Compounding chromium bends chance until it snaps. Misfortune builds â€” tools break, paths mislead, luck turns sour. But every unlucky moment fuels the metalmind, storing fortune like a coiled spring. When released, the world will seem to bend in your favor.
